TopicTitle: [SOLVED] Searching for a mod to record launches and automate them with the recording

Articles.Content:
Hi fellow KSP players,

I came a mod across who lets you record your launch and actions and then reflys this lauch automaticly, so you can just watch with your rocket as may times as you want :-)

However i forgot the name :-( Does anyone know the name and can point me in the right direction ?

Many thanks

ManuxKerb

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T10:50:22Z" title="04/02/2015 10:50  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by ManuxKerb**
  
solved
